analyzed: gang zhig ltung ba 'byin pa dang / gang zhig ltung ba byung nas phyir chos bzhin du mi 'chos pa'o //

analyzed: 'char ka / ltung ba ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags pa 'dis /

original: khyod mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /

translated: the perception of danger, the perception of abandonment, the perception of freedom from desire, the perception of cessation, the perception of death, the perception of impurity, the perception of bloatedness,

original: stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi snod du mi 'gyur zhing /

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /

translated: They will not become vessels for the first, second, third, and fourth concentrations, for love, compassion, joy, and equanimity, for the sense field of infinite space, for the sense field of infinite consciousness,

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang /

translated: for the sense field of nothing-at-all, for the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception, for the fruit of entering the stream, for the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, for the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, for the fruit of arhatship,

analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag ni /
translated: These two

original: chos kyi sgron ma dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / chos kyi 'od dang / chos kyi gsal ba dang / chos kyi mar me dang / chos kyi rab gsal 'bar bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / chos kyi 'od dang / chos kyi gsal ba dang / chos kyi mar me dang / chos kyi rab gsal 'bar bar byed pa yin te /
translated: are the lamp of the Dharma, the light of the Dharma, the radiance of the Dharma, the illumination of the Dharma, the flame of the Dharma, and the blazing beacon of the Dharma.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are these two?

original: gang zhig ltung ba mi 'byin pa dang / gang zhig ltung ba byung na phyir chos bzhin byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ltung ba mi 'byin pa dang / gang zhig ltung ba byung na phyir chos bzhin byed pa'o //
translated: One does not commit transgressions, and if one does, one confesses them according to the Dharma.🔽Two

original: gnyis ni / sdig pa rtsa nas rko ba rgyun nas zlog pa la 'bad pa /
analyzed: gnyis ni / sdig pa rtsa nas rko ba rgyun nas zlog pa la 'bad pa /
translated: are the effort to uproot and stop evil,

original: 'bab chu dang 'khri shing skem pa /🔽bdud dang g-yul 'gyed pa /
analyzed: 'bab chu dang 'khri shing skem pa / bdud dang g-yul 'gyed pa /
translated: to dry up the waterfall and the creeper,🔽to fight with Māra,

original: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba /
analyzed: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba /
translated: to lower Māra’s banner,

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
translated: to raise the banner of the Dharma,

original: sdig pa'i rgyun gcod pa /
analyzed: sdig pa'i rgyun gcod pa /
translated: to cut the stream of evil,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dang @247a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dang @247a *//
translated: and to follow the Dharma of the Tathāgatas.

original: mthun pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su bskor ba yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su bskor ba yin te /
translated: It is a wheel that is turned in accordance with the wheel of Dharma that was turned previously.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: gang zhig ltung ba mi 'byin pa dang / gang zhig ltung ba byung ba na phyir chos bzhin byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ltung ba mi 'byin pa dang / gang zhig ltung ba byung ba na phyir chos bzhin byed pa'o //
translated: One does not commit a downfall, and if one does, one confesses it in accordance with the Dharma.

original: 'char ka / ltung ba bshags pa dang / so sor bshags pa 'dis /
analyzed: 'char ka / ltung ba bshags pa dang / so sor bshags pa 'dis /
translated: Udayi, through confessing and purifying downfalls

original: khyod mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: khyod mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: you should develop the perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering in impermanence, the perception of no self in suffering, the perception of food as a foe, the perception of the total dislike of the entire world,

original: nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang / spong ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / mi gtsang pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang / spong ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / mi gtsang pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /
translated: the perception of danger, the perception of giving up, the perception of separation from desire, the perception of cessation, the perception of death, the perception of impurity, the perception of a bloated corpse,

original: rnam par rnag pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhig pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: rnam par rnag pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhig pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: and the perception of a skeleton.

original: stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i snod du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i snod du 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will become vessels for the discernment of emptiness,

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / @247b rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / @247b rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
translated: and for the first, second, third, and fourth concentrations, and for love, compassion, joy, equanimity, the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang /
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang /
translated: the sphere of nothingness, the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, the fruit of arhatship,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang / zag pa zad pa rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang / zag pa zad pa rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ro //
translated: the sphere of magical power, the divine ear, the knowledge of the mental make-up of others, the knowledge of past lives, the knowledge of death and rebirth, and the knowledge of the destruction of the impurities.

original: 'char ka / ltung ba bshags pa dang / so sor bshags pa 'dis /
analyzed: 'char ka / ltung ba bshags pa dang / so sor bshags pa 'dis /
translated: Udayi, through this confession and acknowledgment of downfalls,

original: khyod 'gro ba gnyis po /
analyzed: khyod 'gro ba gnyis po /
translated: you should aspire to one of two destinies:

original: lha dang mi gang yang rung ba'i 'gro ba 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi gang yang rung ba'i 'gro ba 'dod par bya'o //
translated: either the destiny of the gods or the destiny of human beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi mtha' mi 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi mtha' mi 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni /
translated: The Blessed One has said that the destinies of those who do not conceal their actions🔽are two:

original: gnyis te / lha dang / mi'o //
analyzed: gnyis te / lha dang / mi'o //
translated: either the gods or human beings.

original: gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid ches pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid ches pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who have confidence in my teachings

original: bcabs par mi sems so //
analyzed: bcabs par mi sems so //
translated: do not think to conceal their actions.

original: yang bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: yang bka' stsal pa /
translated: Again, it was said:

original: bcabs pa char ba bzhin du 'bab //
analyzed: bcabs pa char ba bzhin du 'bab //
translated: “What is concealed falls like rain,

original: ma bcabs char bzhin de mi 'bab //
analyzed: ma bcabs char bzhin de mi 'bab //
translated: what is not concealed does not fall like rain.

original: de bas bcabs pa bshags bya ste //
analyzed: de bas bcabs pa bshags bya ste //
translated: Therefore, what is concealed should be confessed,

original: de lta na ni de mi 'bab //
analyzed: de lta na ni de mi 'bab //
translated: in that way it will not fall.”

original: 'char ka / khyod dge 'dun gyis phyung zin gyi /
analyzed: 'char ka / khyod dge 'dun gyis phyung zin gyi /
translated: Udayi, you have been expelled by the Saṅgha,

original: bag yod par sgrubs shig /
analyzed: bag yod par sgrubs shig /
translated: be careful in your practice.

original: dmar ser can gyi gzhi rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dmar ser can gyi gzhi rdzogs so ////
translated: The basis of the one with reddish hair is finished.

original: gang zag gi gzhi'i spyi sdom ni /
analyzed: gang zag gi gzhi'i spyi sdom ni /
translated: The general summary of the basis of the individual:

original: 'char ka dang ni btus pa dang // mtha' dang de bzhin gzhan gyis dang // phyi ma dag tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'char ka dang ni btus pa dang // mtha' dang de bzhin gzhan gyis dang // phyi ma dag tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Udayi, compilation, end, likewise by another, and later.🔽The summary:

original: sdom la / 'char ka gzhan gyis dran pa dang // 'dzem @248a *//
analyzed: sdom la / 'char ka gzhan gyis dran pa dang // 'dzem @248a *//
translated: Udayi, remembered by another,🔽ashamed,🔽now understood,

original: dang da gdod shes pa dang // gnyis dang gnyis dang byas pa'o //
analyzed: dang da gdod shes pa dang // gnyis dang gnyis dang byas pa'o //
translated: two, two, and done.

original: legs par byin dang nyes par byin //
analyzed: legs par byin dang nyes par byin //
translated: Well given, wrongly given,🔽four possibilities, and expression,

original: mu bzhir smra dang brjod pa dang // mu bzhi dag tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: mu bzhir smra dang brjod pa dang // mu bzhi dag tu dbye ba'o //
translated: divided into four possibilities.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at the Jetavana, in the park of Anāthapiṇḍada, near Śrāvastī.

original: de'i tshe 'char ka la ched du bsam ste khu ba phyung ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'char ka la ched du bsam ste khu ba phyung ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pa'i skabs de /
translated: At that time, Udayī had committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense of intentional emission of semen, and he concealed it for half a month.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks reported this to the Blessed One, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: khyed kyis dge slong 'char ka ched du bsam ste khu ba phyung ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: khyed kyis dge slong 'char ka ched du bsam ste khu ba phyung ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: you should give the monk Udayī probation for half a month for a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense of intentional emission of semen that he concealed for half a month, and

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zla ba phyed kyi spo ba byin cig /
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zla ba phyed kyi spo ba byin cig /
translated: you should do the same for anyone else who has committed such an offense.

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyung ba ma bcabs pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyung ba ma bcabs pa'i skabs de /
translated: And there was another monk who had committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense but had not concealed it.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One decreed,

original: dge slong dag /🔽khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de ma bcabs pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: dge slong dag / khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de ma bcabs pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: “Monks,🔽you should give a six-day trial period to anyone who has not concealed his downfall,

original: de ltung bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
analyzed: de ltung bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
translated: and to anyone else who is suitable.

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba des /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba des /
translated: “There was another monk who had two offenses entailing suspension.

original: ltung ba de gnyis su ma shes te /
analyzed: ltung ba de gnyis su ma shes te /
translated: He did not know that he had two offenses.

original: @248b zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang / zla ba gnyis su bcabs nas /
analyzed: @248b zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang / zla ba gnyis su bcabs nas /
translated: After two months had passed, he found out, and after two months had passed, he concealed them.

original: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
analyzed: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
translated: He told the monks about one of the offenses,

original: gcig ni / ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba byin /
analyzed: gcig ni / ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba byin /
translated: but not about the other. The saṅgha gave him probation for two months.

original: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While he was on probation,

original: des dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes nas skabs de /
analyzed: des dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes nas skabs de /
translated: he found out about the offense that he had not told the saṅgha about.

original: dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: He told the monks, and the monks told the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /🔽khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: dge slong dag / khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: “Monks,🔽you should give that person probation for the two months,

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zla ba gnyis po de nyid kyi spo ba byin te /
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zla ba gnyis po de nyid kyi spo ba byin te /
translated: and anyone else who is similar to him.

original: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will remember it as he has understood it.”

original: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba des /
analyzed: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba des /
translated: Another person had committed two offenses entailing suspension.

original: ltung ba de gnyis zla ba gnyis su ma shes te zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang / zla ba gnyis bcabs te /
analyzed: ltung ba de gnyis zla ba gnyis su ma shes te zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang / zla ba gnyis bcabs te /
translated: He did not understand that he had committed two offenses for two months. After two months had passed, he understood that he had committed two offenses, and he concealed them for two months.

original: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
analyzed: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
translated: He told the monks about one offense,

original: gcig ni ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba byin te /🔽de spo ba byed pa na /
analyzed: gcig ni ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba byin te / de spo ba byed pa na /
translated: but he did not tell them about the other. The Sangha gave him probation for two months.🔽While he was on probation,

original: ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur pa'i skabs de /
translated: he became ashamed.

original: dge slong rnams la smras pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la smras pa /
translated: He said to the monks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerable ones,

original: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ste /
analyzed: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ste /
translated: I have incurred two saṃghāvaśeṣa offenses.

original: bdag gis ltung ba de gnyis zla ba gnyis su ma shes te /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba de gnyis zla ba gnyis su ma shes te /
translated: I did not recognize those two offenses for two months.

original: zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang zla ba gnyis bcabs te /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis lon nas shes pa dang zla ba gnyis bcabs te /
translated: After two months had passed, I recognized them and concealed them for two months.

original: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
analyzed: gcig ni / dge slong rnams la smras /
translated: I told the monks about one of them,

original: gcig ni ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun @249a *//
analyzed: gcig ni ma smras pa dang / dge 'dun @249a *//
translated: but I did not tell them about the other.

original: gyis bdag la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba stsal te /
analyzed: gyis bdag la zla ba gnyis kyi spo ba stsal te /
translated: The saṅgha gave me probation for two months.

original: bdag spo ba bgyid pa na ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: bdag spo ba bgyid pa na ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs de /
translated: While I was on probation, I became ashamed.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba ji ltar bcabs pa de dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la spo ba sbyin te /
analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba ji ltar bcabs pa de dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la spo ba sbyin te /
translated: you should give probation to that person for as long as he concealed his offenses, and to anyone else who is similar to him.

original: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will remember it as he has recognized it.”

original: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la de zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na /
analyzed: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la de zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na /
translated: Also, when another person who has committed a partial defeat of the monastic community recites the Sūtra of Individual Liberation every half month,

original: 'di skad ces /
analyzed: 'di skad ces /
translated: he says,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /🔽bdag gis chos 'di ji ltar mdo las 'byung zhing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag / bdag gis chos 'di ji ltar mdo las 'byung zhing /
translated: “Venerable ones,🔽I have just now understood this Dharma as it appears in the sūtras

original: mdo'i khongs su gtogs par da gzod shes so //🔽zhes smras na /
analyzed: mdo'i khongs su gtogs par da gzod shes so // zhes smras na /
translated: and as it is included in the sūtras.”

original: gal te dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di /
analyzed: gal te dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di /
translated: If the monks know that the venerable one

original: sngar gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum la ni /
analyzed: sngar gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum la ni /
translated: has attended two or three poṣadha rites before,

original: 'dus na / lan mang du yang re snyam zhes bya bar de'i rgyus shes na /
analyzed: 'dus na / lan mang du yang re snyam zhes bya bar de'i rgyus shes na /
translated: and that he has said many times, “I will learn,”

original: tshe dang ldan pa de'i mi shes na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa de'i mi shes na /
translated: but the venerable one does not know,

original: tshe dang ldan pa de'i mi shes pas thar pa med pa nyid pas de ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de phyir chos bzhin byed du gzhug cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa de'i mi shes pas thar pa med pa nyid pas de ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de phyir chos bzhin byed du gzhug cing /
translated: then because the venerable one does not know, he is not liberated. Therefore, he should be made to confess the downfall that he has incurred in accordance with the Dharma.

original: phyis kyang 'gyod pa bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: phyis kyang 'gyod pa bskyed par bya ste /
translated: Subsequently, he should be made to feel remorse.

original: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will remember it as he has understood it.

original: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na /

original: gal te dge slong dag gis /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di /

analyzed: sngar gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum la ni 'dus na /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa de'i mi shes pas thar pa med pa nyid pas / de ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de /

analyzed: phyir chos bzhin du byed du gzhug cing / phyis 'gyod pa bskyed par ni /

analyzed: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la phyi ma'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /

translated: Just as there are four due to the lack of distinction, there are also four due to knowledge, four due to mindfulness, and four due to doubt.

analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis bzhi tshan gzhan dag ste /

translated: Just as it is for the one who is transferred, so it is for the one who practices the transference, the one who practices the pleasing, and the one who gives the training.

translated: Just as it is for the one who is expelled, so it is for the one who accepts the novice monk status, the one who is insane, the one whose mind is disturbed, the one who is suffering, the one who is not seen,

original: gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba log par song ba mi 'dor bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba log par song ba mi 'dor bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: the one who is expelled for not giving up bad views, and the one who is expelled for not giving up bad views that have arisen.

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /
translated: Also, a certain person committed two partial defeats of the monk community, one concealed and one unconcealed.

original: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
translated: He came to the community and was fully ordained again.

original: des bcabs nas babs pa gang yin pa de /🔽bcabs bzhin du dge slong rnams la smras pa /
analyzed: des bcabs nas babs pa gang yin pa de / bcabs bzhin du dge slong rnams la smras pa /
translated: He concealed the one he had concealed.🔽He told the monks about the one he had not concealed.

original: ma bcabs pa gang yin pa de yang ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: ma bcabs pa gang yin pa de yang ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: The monks told the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /🔽khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: dge slong dag / khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: “Monks,🔽you should give probation for that person’s offense and for any others like it.

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gcig gi snga ma dang / phyi ma dang gnyis ka'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gcig gi snga ma dang / phyi ma dang gnyis ka'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /
translated: You should give probation for one person’s offense based on the earlier and later continuums, and for two people’s offenses based on the earlier, later, and middle continuums.”

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang / ma bcabs par babs te 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang / ma bcabs par babs te 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
translated: a certain person had two unconcealed and two concealed offenses for which he was suspended. He was reordained.

analyzed: des bcabs nas babs pa gang yin pa de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras /

analyzed: ma bcabs pa gang yin pa de ma bcabs par smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de'i @252b ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /

analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la /
translated: anyone else who is in a similar situation.

original: gcig gi ni /

analyzed: snga ma'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /

original: gcig ni / zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
analyzed: gcig ni / zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
translated: should be made to please the monks for six days.🔽Also,

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /

analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te / des bcabs pa gang yin pa de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras /
translated: When he returned, he was fully ordained again.🔽He confessed to the monks the offense he had concealed.🔽He confessed to the monks the offense he had not concealed.

analyzed: ma bcabs pa gang yin pa de bcabs nas dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //

analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: you should give probation for that offense of that person and

analyzed: sngon gyi rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /

analyzed: phyi ma'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gnyis byung ba bcabs pa dang ma bcabs par babs te /
translated: Another person committed two offenses entailing suspension. One he concealed and one he did not conceal.

original: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs te /
translated: When he returned, he was fully ordained again.

original: des bcabs nas babs pa gang yin pa de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras /
analyzed: des bcabs nas babs pa gang yin pa de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras /
translated: He confessed the concealed offenses, but not the unconcealed ones.🔽He confessed the unconcealed offenses, but not the concealed ones.

analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: you should give probation for that offense of that person,

analyzed: de @253a *// lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gcig gi ni / sngon gyi rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /

analyzed: zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /

analyzed: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba dang / spo ba spyad pa dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / bslab pa byin pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The probation, the probationer, the pleasing, the pleaser, and the bestowal of training should be explained in the same way as the concealed and unconcealed offenses.”

original: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa dang / smyos pa nyid dang / sems 'khrugs pa nyid dang / tshor bas nyen pa nyid dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang /
analyzed: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa dang / smyos pa nyid dang / sems 'khrugs pa nyid dang / tshor bas nyen pa nyid dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid dang /
translated: The same should be said in detail about the other grounds for relinquishment:🔽the one who has been relinquished through not recognizing, the one who has been relinquished through not making amends, the one who has been relinquished through not giving up evil views,

analyzed: sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid la yang de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba tshad dang ldan pa byung ba bcabs pa de /🔽dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba byas te bslang zin pa des /

translated: Moreover, a certain person who had committed a partial defeat offense of the saṃgha and had concealed it🔽was relinquished by the saṃgha through not seeing him.

original: ltung ba rnams bcabs nas dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: ltung ba rnams bcabs nas dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: After he had been restored, he concealed his offenses and told the monks. The monks told the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /

analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de dang / gzhan yang /

analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig @253b dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba tshad dang ldan pa byung ba bcabs pa de /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba byas te bslang zin pa des /

analyzed: ltung ba de rnams ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /🔽khyed kyis gang zag de dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: dge slong dag / khyed kyis gang zag de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: “Monks,🔽you should say to that person and to anyone else like him:

analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la ltung ba de rnams tshad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‘These offenses of yours are serious.’

original: zhes byos la sngon gyi rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /
analyzed: zhes byos la sngon gyi rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /
translated: And then, beginning with the later sequence, give him probation.

analyzed: yang gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba tshad dang ldan pa byung ba ma bcabs pa de /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba byas te bslang zin pa des /

original: ltung ba de rnams bcabs te dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ltung ba de rnams bcabs te dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba tshad dang ldan pa byung ba ma bcabs pa de /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba byas te bslang zin pa des /

analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la ltung ba de rnams tshad dang ldan pa'o // zhes byos la /

analyzed: zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /

analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshad dang mi ldan pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: As with the acknowledgment of downfalls, so also with the acknowledgment of non-downfalls.

analyzed: ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba brgyad yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du /

analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /

original: ma spyad pa spyod du chug cig dang spo ba spyad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma spyad pa spyod du chug cig dang spo ba spyad par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he has practiced the penance, he is to be fully ordained.🔽When he has been fully ordained, he is to be made to practice the penance.🔽When he has practiced the penance, he is to be fully ordained.🔽When he has been fully ordained, he is to be made to practice the penance.🔽When he has practiced the penance, he is to be fully ordained.

translated: When he has been fully ordained, he is to be made to practice the penance.

analyzed: gang zag spo ba spyad zin pa dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung nas babs te /
translated: When a person who has already undergone probation commits a partial defeat offense and is expelled,

original: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gang zag des @254b spo ba spyad zin pa nyid pas de dang / de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la mgu bar bya ba byin cig /

translated: The same applies to those who have been expelled for not giving up evil views, having accepted the status of a novice monk, and so on, as in the case of probation.

original: gang zag mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung nas babs te /
analyzed: gang zag mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung nas babs te /
translated: When a person who is undergoing approval for a change of mind commits a partial defeat offense and is expelled,

original: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /
translated: if he returns and is reordained,🔽the monks should request the Blessed One to allow it.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: ma spyad pa spyod du chug cig dang mgu bar bya ba spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma spyad pa spyod du chug cig dang mgu bar bya ba spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Let him practice the penance. He will practice the penance that pleases the saṅgha.

original: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgre ba gong ma lta bu de nyid yin no //
analyzed: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgre ba gong ma lta bu de nyid yin no //
translated: The rest is the same as the previous case.

original: gang zag mgu ba spyad zin pa dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung nas babs te /
analyzed: gang zag mgu ba spyad zin pa dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung nas babs te /
translated: “Monks, suppose a person who has already practiced the penance that pleases the saṅgha commits a saṅghadisesa offense and is suspended.

original: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de 'ongs nas slar bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i skabs de /
translated: “When he returns, he should be fully ordained again.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: de mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa nyid pas 'di phyung zhig /
analyzed: de mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa nyid pas 'di phyung zhig /
translated: since he has already practiced the penance that pleases the saṅgha, he should be reinstated.

original: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgre ba gong ma lta bu de nyid yin no //
analyzed: babs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgre ba gong ma lta bu de nyid yin no //
translated: The rest is the same as the previous case.

original: ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba'i gang zag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs pa de /
analyzed: ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba'i gang zag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs pa de /
translated: “Monks, suppose a person who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense commits a saṅghadisesa offense that he has not concealed.

original: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas phyung ste bslang zin pa des /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas phyung ste bslang zin pa des /
translated: The Saṅgha had ejected him for not recognizing an offense, but he had then recognized it and been restored.

original: ltung ba de bcabs nas /
analyzed: ltung ba de bcabs nas /
translated: He confessed that offense

original: dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: to the monks, and the monks told the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong @255a *//🔽dag / khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: dge slong @255a *// dag / khyed kyis gang zag de'i ltung ba de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: “Monks,

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la phyi ma'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig /🔽ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba'i gang zag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs pa de /
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la phyi ma'i rgyud nas bzung ste spo ba byin cig / ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba'i gang zag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs pa de /
translated: you should give probation to that person for the offense he has committed and for any other similar offenses he may have committed,🔽starting from the present time.🔽“A person who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense commits a serious offense and does not confess it.

original: dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ste /

original: bslang zin pa des ltung ba de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: bslang zin pa des ltung ba de ma bcabs par dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: to the monks, and the monks tell the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: khyed kyis gang zag de dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: khyed kyis gang zag de dang / gzhan yang /
translated: You should give that person, and anyone else like them,

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la zhag drug gi mgu bar bya ba byin cig /
translated: six days of satisfaction.

original: khyad par med pas gnyis yin pa de bzhin du shes pas gnyis dang / dran pas gnyis dang / yid gnyis kyis gnyis kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: khyad par med pas gnyis yin pa de bzhin du shes pas gnyis dang / dran pas gnyis dang / yid gnyis kyis gnyis kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as there are two for each of the two, so there are two for each of the two through recollection, and two for each of the two through doubt.

original: ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba brgyad yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du slar mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba brgyad dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas phyung ba brgyad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba brgyad yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du slar mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba brgyad dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas phyung ba brgyad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as there are eight for not seeing, so there are eight for not doing again, and eight for not giving up a sinful view.

original: sdom la / brtsams pa bcu gnyis dag dang ni //
analyzed: sdom la / brtsams pa bcu gnyis dag dang ni //
translated: The summary: The twelve beginnings,🔽all the ninth, the black,🔽the nine pairs,

analyzed: dgu pa thams cad nag po dang // zung dgu dag tu byas pa dang // tshig bcu dang ni lnga pa'o //

analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa byung ba bcabs te /

translated: but he did not know the number of downfalls.🔽The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One,

analyzed: dge @255b slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas bslang ba dang / mgu bar bya ba yang chos ma yin pas byin la /
translated: The saṅgha gave him a trial period of probation from the beginning because it was a case of a saṅgha that was divided and acting illegitimately, and it gave him the trial period of penance through an illegitimate legal procedure.🔽When he had completed that trial period of probation from the beginning,

original: phyung ba yang chos @256b ma yin pas byas na /

translated: This person

analyzed: thams cad nag po zhes bya ste /

original: dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin te /
translated: The saṅgha did not deem it appropriate to impose an act of supernormal power, so it gave him probation.

original: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /

analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs pa de la /
translated: he committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense similar to the previous one and concealed it.

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin te /

analyzed: de gzhi nas spo ba byed bzhin pa las /

analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs pa de la /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os gzhi nas bslang ba dang mgu bar bya ba yang chos ma yin pas byin la /
translated: The saṅgha deemed it appropriate to impose an act of supernormal power, so it gave him rehabilitation and satisfaction through an act that was not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: phyung pa yang chos ma yin pas byas na /
analyzed: phyung pa yang chos ma yin pas byas na /

original: gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /

analyzed: phal cher nag po zhas bya ste /

analyzed: ma dag pa ma bslang ba ste /

analyzed: gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba bcabs pa de la /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /

translated: The Saṅgha has lifted the suspension of his duties because it is not right to leave him in a state of disturbance due to unrighteous acts.

original: phyung ba yang chos ma yin pas byas na /
analyzed: phyung ba yang chos ma yin pas byas na /
translated: He has been given satisfaction because he has been reinstated by unrighteous means.

original: gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /
translated: This person is called

original: phyed nag pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyed nag pa zhes bya ste /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin te /

analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs pa de la /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas yang gzhi nas bslang ba byin te /

analyzed: mgu bar bya ba yang chos kyis byas la / phyung ba ni /

original: chos ma yin pas na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pas na /

original: gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /

analyzed: phyogs gcig nag po zhes bya ste /

analyzed: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /

analyzed: nag po dang bral ba zhes bya ste /

original: de na gcig gis ni /🔽bshags la / gcig shos kyis ni /🔽ma bshags na /
analyzed: de na gcig gis ni / bshags la / gcig shos kyis ni / ma bshags na /
translated: One of them confessed it,🔽but the other did not.

original: de la ma bshags pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: de la ma bshags pa gang yin pa de /
translated: The one who had not confessed it🔽was made to confess a great many offenses that were violations of the monastic code.

original: 'dul ba las 'gal ba'i nyes byas rab tu mang po'i ltung ba 'chags su bcug la de'i 'og tu spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba byin te dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba las 'gal ba'i nyes byas rab tu mang po'i ltung ba 'chags su bcug la de'i 'og tu spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba byin te dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: After that, he should be sent away, sent away from the very beginning, or made to do a probationary penance and then be rehabilitated.

original: gang zag gcig gi drung du ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis kyi 'am /
analyzed: gang zag gcig gi drung du ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis kyi 'am /
translated: Just as with one person, so it is with two,

original: mang po'i 'am /
analyzed: mang po'i 'am /
translated: with many,

original: dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin no //
translated: and with the whole community.

original: gnas de nyid du ji lta bar gnas gzhan yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gnas de nyid du ji lta bar gnas gzhan yang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as with that place, so it is with another place.🔽Suppose that another person has concealed a pārājika offense.

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bcabs pa de la; dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bcabs pa de la; dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
translated: The Saṅgha has placed a legal procedure of condemnation on him, and so has given him probation.

original: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While he is on probation,

original: ltung ba gzhan shes te /🔽des dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes /
analyzed: ltung ba gzhan shes te / des dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes /
translated: he commits another offense.🔽He knows that he has committed an offense that he has not yet confessed to the Saṅgha.

original: des dge 'dun gyi nang du smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes nas /
analyzed: des dge 'dun gyi nang du smras pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa de yang shes nas /
translated: He knows that he has committed an offense that he has confessed to the Saṅgha.

original: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
translated: He said to the monks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerable ones,

original: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
translated: I have committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense that I have concealed. The saṅgha has given me a mānāpya rite that is not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: bdag spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: bdag spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While I am undergoing mānāpya,

original: ltung ba gzhan @260a *//
analyzed: ltung ba gzhan @260a *//
translated: I have come to know of another offense.

original: shes te / bdag gis dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa gang yin pa dang / bdag gis ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa gang yin pa'i ltung ba de yang bdag gis shes kyi /
analyzed: shes te / bdag gis dge 'dun gyi nang du ma smras pa gang yin pa dang / bdag gis ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa gang yin pa'i ltung ba de yang bdag gis shes kyi /
translated: I have not told the saṅgha about it, and the saṅgha has given me a mānāpya rite that is not in accordance with the Dharma for the offense that I have come to know about.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerable ones,

original: bdag gi ltung ba snga ma de dang / phyi ma 'di la chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba legs par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gi ltung ba snga ma de dang / phyi ma 'di la chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba legs par stsal du gsol /
translated: please give me a mānāpya rite that is in accordance with the Dharma for my previous offense and this later one.”🔽Those monks said to him,

original: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
translated: “Venerable one,

original: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin /
analyzed: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin /
translated: Since it is not appropriate to assign a legal procedure of reconciliation for a Dharma-related offense, he was given probation.

original: phyi ma de la ni /
analyzed: phyi ma de la ni /
translated: Later,

original: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
translated: since it was appropriate to assign a legal procedure of reconciliation for a non-Dharma-related offense, he was given probation.

original: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While he was on probation,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs nas /
translated: he concealed a partial defeat that was a downfall, like the previous one.

original: des de'i ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa de shes nas /
analyzed: des de'i ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa de shes nas /
translated: When the saṅgha knew that he had concealed a partial defeat for which it was appropriate to assign a legal procedure of reconciliation that was not Dharma, he was given probation.🔽He said to the monks,

original: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerables,

original: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin te /
translated: I have concealed a partial defeat, and the saṅgha has given me probation for which it is appropriate to assign a legal procedure of reconciliation that is not Dharma.

original: bdag spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: bdag spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While I was on probation,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs te /
translated: The monk had committed a partial defeat, just as in the previous downfall, but had concealed it.

original: bdag gis ltung ba bar ma de dang / bdag gis gang la dge 'dun gyis @260b chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa yang shes kyi /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba bar ma de dang / bdag gis gang la dge 'dun gyis @260b chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas spo ba byin pa yang shes kyi /
translated: “I know that I have committed a partial defeat and that the Saṅgha has rightly imposed a disturbance procedure on me.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerable sirs,

original: bdag gis ltung ba snga ma de la spo ba dang / ltung ba bar ma de la gzhi nas spo ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba snga ma de la spo ba dang / ltung ba bar ma de la gzhi nas spo ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
translated: please grant me a probation for the previous downfall and a trial period of probation for the partial defeat, since it is not right to impose a disturbance procedure on me for the previous downfall and a trial period of probation for the partial defeat.”

original: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /🔽chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin /🔽ltung ba bar ma de la ni /🔽chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin te /
analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni / chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas spo ba byin / ltung ba bar ma de la ni / chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin te /
translated: The monks granted him a probation for the previous downfall🔽and a trial period of probation for the partial defeat, since it was not right to impose a disturbance procedure on him for the previous downfall and a trial period of probation for the partial defeat.

original: de gzhi nas spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de gzhi nas spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While he was undergoing the trial period of probation for the partial defeat,🔽he committed another partial defeat.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs te /
translated: He had committed a partial defeat of the Saṅgha that was similar to a partial defeat that he had previously committed and concealed.

original: des yang bzlas te byung ba'i ltung ba de yang shes /
analyzed: des yang bzlas te byung ba'i ltung ba de yang shes /
translated: He knew that he had committed that partial defeat that was similar to a previous partial defeat that he had concealed.

original: ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin pas yang shes nas /
analyzed: ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin pas yang shes nas /
translated: He knew that the Saṅgha had given him probation for that partial defeat that was similar to a previous partial defeat that he had concealed, and that he was on probation.🔽He told the monks,

original: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa dag /🔽bdag gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs pa shes te /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa dag / bdag gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs pa shes te /
translated: “Venerables,🔽I have committed a partial defeat of the Saṅgha that is similar to a partial defeat that I committed and concealed previously.

original: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin nas /
analyzed: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin nas /
translated: The Saṅgha gave me probation for that partial defeat that was similar to a previous partial defeat that I had concealed.

original: bdag gzhi nas spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: bdag gzhi nas spo ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While I was on probation,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba bcabs te /
translated: I committed a partial defeat of the Saṅgha that was similar to a partial defeat that I had previously committed and concealed.

original: bdag gis yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de yang shes /
analyzed: bdag gis yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de yang shes /
translated: I also know that I have committed a downfall that requires forfeiture.

original: ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs pas bdag gis @261a *//
analyzed: ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba bcabs pas bdag gis @261a *//
translated: I also know that I have committed a downfall that requires acknowledgment, which is similar to the previous downfall.

original: de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
analyzed: de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
translated: I also know that the Saṅgha has given me probation for that offense, which is a legal procedure based on what is not the Dharma and is subject to dispute.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerable ones,

original: bdag gi ltung ba bar ma de la gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang bzlas te byung ba 'di la yang gzhi nas bslang ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gi ltung ba bar ma de la gzhi nas spo ba dang / yang bzlas te byung ba 'di la yang gzhi nas bslang ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
translated: I ask that you lift that probation for my downfall that requires acknowledgment, which is similar to the previous downfall, and that you give me a procedure for rehabilitation for my downfall that requires forfeiture, which is similar to the previous downfall.

original: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
translated: Those monks gave him probation for his previous downfall,

original: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin /
analyzed: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas gzhi nas spo ba byin /
translated: saying, “This legal procedure based on the Dharma is not subject to dispute.

original: yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de la ni /
analyzed: yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de la ni /
translated: They also gave him rehabilitation for his downfall that requires forfeiture,

original: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pa gzhi nas bslang ba byin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pa gzhi nas bslang ba byin no //
translated: saying, “This legal procedure based on what is not the Dharma is subject to dispute.”

original: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de la /
analyzed: yang / gang zag gzhan zhig dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de la /
translated: Also, a certain person had committed a partial defeat.

original: dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
translated: The saṅgha had given him a trial period for a non-Dharma action.

original: de mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: de mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: While he was undergoing the trial period,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba dang / des ltung ba bar ma de dang / gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin pa yang shes nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba dang / des ltung ba bar ma de dang / gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin pa yang shes nas /
translated: he committed a partial defeat, which was similar to the previous partial defeat, and he knew that the saṅgha had given him a trial period for a non-Dharma action.

original: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
translated: He said to the monks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerables,

original: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
analyzed: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
translated: I have not concealed a partial defeat.

original: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
analyzed: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
translated: The saṅgha has given me a trial period for a non-Dharma action.

original: bdag mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin @261b pa las /
analyzed: bdag mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin @261b pa las /
translated: While I am undergoing the trial period,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
translated: The monk had committed a partial defeat, just as in the previous downfall, but had not concealed it.🔽He said, “I know that I have committed a partial defeat and that the Saṅgha should have given me a trial period for that offense, but that it was not appropriate to do so.

original: bdag gis ltung ba bar ma dang bdag gis ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba bar ma dang bdag gis ltung ba gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
translated: I also know that I have committed a partial defeat and that the Saṅgha should give me a trial period for that offense from the beginning, but that it is not appropriate to do so.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerable sirs,

original: bdag gis ltung ba snga ma de la mgu bar bya ba dang / ltung ba bar ma 'di la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba snga ma de la mgu bar bya ba dang / ltung ba bar ma 'di la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
translated: please give me a trial period for my previous offense, and please give me a trial period for this partial defeat from the beginning, but do not do so in a way that is not in accordance with the Dharma.”

original: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la ni /
translated: The monks gave him a trial period for his previous offense

original: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin /🔽ltung ba bar ma 'di la ni /
analyzed: chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas mgu bar bya ba byin / ltung ba bar ma 'di la ni /
translated: in a way that was not in accordance with the Dharma,🔽and they gave him a trial period for this partial defeat

original: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin /
translated: in a way that was not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: de gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las /🔽dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba ma bcabs te /
analyzed: de gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las / dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba ma bcabs te /
translated: He was in the process of doing that🔽when he committed a second offense similar to the first offense entailing suspension.🔽He did not conceal that offense,

original: de yang bzlas te byung ba'i ltung ba de dang / de'i ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes nas /
analyzed: de yang bzlas te byung ba'i ltung ba de dang / de'i ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes nas /
translated: and the Saṅgha gave him the trial period for that offense and for the offense entailing suspension.

original: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
translated: He then told the monks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /🔽bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag / bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung ba ma bcabs te /
translated: “Venerables,🔽I committed a second offense entailing suspension similar to the first offense entailing suspension.🔽I did not conceal that offense,

original: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
analyzed: bdag gis de la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin te /
translated: and the Saṅgha gave me the trial period for that offense and for the offense entailing suspension.

original: bdag @262a *// gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las /
analyzed: bdag @262a *// gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byed bzhin pa las /
translated: I was in the process of doing that🔽when I committed a third offense similar to the first offense entailing suspension.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba ma bcabs te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bzlas te byung ba ma bcabs te /
translated: The offense of a partial defeat is similar to the offense of a serious transgression.

original: bdag gis yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de dang / bdag gis ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
analyzed: bdag gis yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba de dang / bdag gis ltung ba bar ma gang la dge 'dun gyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba byin pa de yang shes kyi /
translated: I know that I have committed this offense of a partial defeat and that the Saṅgha has given me the trial period for the offense of a serious transgression that I committed, an offense for which the Saṅgha should have imposed a trial period that is not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerable sirs,

original: bdag gi ltung ba snga ma bar ma de la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba 'di la gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gi ltung ba snga ma bar ma de la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba 'di la gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas legs par stsal du gsol /
translated: please grant me the trial period for the offense of a partial defeat that I have committed and for which I should be granted the trial period from the beginning, and the trial period for this offense of a partial defeat that I have committed and for which I should be granted the trial period after lifting the restrictions, a trial period that is not in accordance with the Dharma.

translated: Those monks, having made him satisfied with the former and intermediate downfalls, and having made him satisfied with this downfall of a repeated offense, gave him the trial period, since it was not suitable to leave him in a disturbed state of a Dharma action.

analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyis de'i ltung ba snga ma la gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang bzlas pa'i ltung ba 'di la gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba chos kyi las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas byin no //
translated: The monks should not give him the act of reconciliation for the former offense and the act of making amends for the present offense, because it is not proper to give him a stable act of Dharma.

analyzed: shes pas bzhi yin pa ji lta bar dran pas bzhi dang / yid kyis bzhi yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: de'i rjes su phyogs pa las gyur pa zhag bcu gcig bcabs /

analyzed: 'dren mar byed pa /

analyzed: nag nog can du byed pa /

analyzed: bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang ba can rnams las kyang /

translated: Since the enjoyment of the first fruits of autumn, the first fruits of downfall, and the first fruits of alms is of short duration, they will wander, experiencing the suffering of hell beings, animals, and ghosts for a long time.

original: ma la bdag cag gis bslab pa phul ba 'bab bo //
analyzed: ma la bdag cag gis bslab pa phul ba 'bab bo //

analyzed: snyam nas de dag gis bslab pa phul nas babs te /

analyzed: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i skye bo la yang /
translated: To the people who wanted to go forth,

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /

analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa ni /

analyzed: spyad dka'i / khyed rab tu 'byung ba thong zhig ces slu bar byed bas de rnams rab tu ma byung ngo //

analyzed: rab tu ma byung bas dge slong rnams nyung bar gyur /

original: 'grib @266b par gyur te /
analyzed: 'grib @266b par gyur te /

original: bsrabs par gyur to //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
analyzed: bsrabs par gyur to // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /

original: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /
analyzed: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa /
translated: The Buddha, the Blessed One, asked the venerable Ānanda,

analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na da ltar dge slong nyung bar gyur /

original: 'grib par gyur te /
analyzed: 'grib par gyur te /

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun nyams par gyur /
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun nyams par gyur /

original: bsrabs par gyur /
analyzed: bsrabs par gyur /

original: de skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
analyzed: de skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
translated: At that time, the Blessed One was offered a detailed account of the situation, and then the Blessed One thought this:

original: ma la ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba rnams rjes su gzung ba bca' bas lag nas drang ba dang 'dra ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: ma la ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba rnams rjes su gzung ba bca' bas lag nas drang ba dang 'dra ba sbyin par bya'o //

original: snyam du dgongs nas /
analyzed: snyam du dgongs nas /
translated: Having thought this,

analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //

analyzed: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /

translated: “Bhikṣus,

original: zhes thos kyi /
analyzed: zhes thos kyi /
translated: I have heard that those who have committed a pārājika offense have given up the training and have become regretful.

translated: Therefore, in order to maintain the teaching and out of compassion for those bhikṣus who have committed a pārājika offense, you should perform the probation, the preliminary probation, the lifting of the preliminary probation, the pleasing,

analyzed: gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba byin la dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: He should be lifted up, satisfied, and given a probation.

original: sbyin pa yang 'di ltar bya ste /🔽gnas mal bshams la gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis @267a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa yang 'di ltar bya ste / gnas mal bshams la gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis @267a *//

translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so, have committed many offenses entailing suspension for emitting semen through intention. I have concealed these for half a month.

translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so, have committed many offenses entailing suspension for emitting semen through intention. I have concealed these for half a month. I ask the community for probation for half a month.

analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ched du bsam ste /

translated: Since you have given the probation for half a month, I will regard this as done.”
