analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Give probation and the trial period for those who have committed offenses.”

original: zhes rgyas par bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: zhes rgyas par bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang /
translated: The monks of the group of six who were on probation and who were trying to please others did not do what they were supposed to do in the presence of the monks who were living in accordance with the Dharma. They did not speak to them, bow to them, rise up for them, join the palms in respect to them,🔽or do acts of respect to them.

original: 'dud pa'i las bdag gir byed pa la don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed /🔽gzhogs 'phyas byed /
analyzed: 'dud pa'i las bdag gir byed pa la don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed / gzhogs 'phyas byed /
translated: The monks who had few desires complained and criticized them,🔽saying, “How can the monks of the group of six act like this?”

original: kha zer bar byed de /
analyzed: kha zer bar byed de /
translated: They told the Blessed One what had happened, and the Blessed One said,🔽“Monks, the monks of the group of six should do what they are supposed to do in the presence of the monks who are living in accordance with the Dharma.

original: de ltar spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis rang bzhin @268b du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bdag gir byed pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis rang bzhin @268b du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bdag gir byed pa ni /
translated: In this way, the monks who are engaged in probation and in appeasing should not do the work of welcoming, prostrating, rising, joining palms, and bowing to the resident monks.

original: bzang po ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzang po ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not good, it is not proper.”

original: zhes pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: zhes pa'i skabs de /
translated: At that time,

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: the monks requested the Blessed One to resolve this matter, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: ngas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste /
analyzed: ngas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste /
translated: I will establish a rule for the monks who are engaged in probation and in appeasing.

original: spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang; ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bdag gir mi bya'o //🔽stan gcig la ma yin /
analyzed: spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang; ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bdag gir mi bya'o // stan gcig la ma yin /
translated: “Monks who are mendicants and monks who are satisfied should not be subservient to monks who are not mendicants and who are not satisfied.🔽“They should not sit on the same seat.

original: stan mnyam par ma yin te /
analyzed: stan mnyam par ma yin te /
translated: They should not sit on the same level.

original: stan ches dma' ba blangs te 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: stan ches dma' ba blangs te 'dug par bya'o //
translated: They should sit on a lower seat.

original: 'chag sar lhan cig bcag par mi bya /
analyzed: 'chag sar lhan cig bcag par mi bya /
translated: “They should not walk together.

original: mdun du ma yin te /🔽gal te 'chag sar 'chag na /
analyzed: mdun du ma yin te / gal te 'chag sar 'chag na /
translated: They should not walk in front.🔽If they are walking,

original: gom pa bsri'o //
analyzed: gom pa bsri'o //
translated: they should walk behind.

original: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not go to the houses of brahmins and householders.

original: gal te 'gro na /
analyzed: gal te 'gro na /
translated: If they go,

original: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul du bya'o //
translated: they should act as if they were mendicants who are following behind.

original: steng g-yogs gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o //🔽rab tu dbyung bar mi bya /
analyzed: steng g-yogs gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o // rab tu dbyung bar mi bya /
translated: “They should not stay in the same room.🔽They should not be given the going forth.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya /🔽gnas mi sbyin /
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya / gnas mi sbyin /
translated: They should not be given ordination.🔽They should not be given a place to stay.

original: dge tshul mi gzhag /
analyzed: dge tshul mi gzhag /
translated: They should not be given novice ordination.

original: las mi bya /
analyzed: las mi bya /
translated: They should not be given work.

original: las byed par bsko bar mi bya /
analyzed: las byed par bsko bar mi bya /
translated: He should not be appointed as an attendant.

original: dge slong ma rnams la gdams ngag dpog par mi bya /🔽dge slong ma rnams kyi gdams ngag 'bogs par bsko bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams la gdams ngag dpog par mi bya / dge slong ma rnams kyi gdams ngag 'bogs par bsko bar mi bya /
translated: He should not be appointed to give instruction to the nuns.

original: sngon @269a *// bskos pa zhig yin na yang dge slong ma rnams la gdams ngag dpog par mi bya /
analyzed: sngon @269a *// bskos pa zhig yin na yang dge slong ma rnams la gdams ngag dpog par mi bya /
translated: He should not be appointed to give instruction to the nuns, even if he was previously appointed.

original: dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya /
translated: He should not accuse a monk of a fault in morality, a fault in view, a fault in conduct, or a fault in livelihood.

original: dran par mi bya ste /🔽'dis gdams ngag dpog par mi bya /
analyzed: dran par mi bya ste / 'dis gdams ngag dpog par mi bya /
translated: He should not be mindful of that.🔽He should not give instruction.

original: gso sbyong ma yin /🔽dgag dbye ma yin /🔽gsol ba ma yin /
analyzed: gso sbyong ma yin / dgag dbye ma yin / gsol ba ma yin /
translated: He should not do the purification ceremony.🔽He should not do the invitation ceremony.🔽He should not do the motion.

original: gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin te /
analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin te /
translated: He should not do the motion and the two proclamations.

original: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi bya'o //🔽nang par sngar langs la sgo dbye bar bya'o //🔽mar me'i sdong bu bsal la gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi bya'o // nang par sngar langs la sgo dbye bar bya'o // mar me'i sdong bu bsal la gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya'o //
translated: He should not do the legal procedure of a motion and four proclamations.🔽He should get up early in the morning and open the doors of the dwellings.

original: phyag dar bya /
analyzed: phyag dar bya /
translated: He should remove the old wick from the lamps and sweep the yard of the monastery.🔽He should sweep the yard of the monastery.

original: ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug par bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug par bya'o //
translated: He should anoint it with fresh cow dung.

original: chab kung sa dang snam phyis phyag dar byas la sa dang lo ma'am dus dang mthun pa'i chu bsil ba gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: chab kung sa dang snam phyis phyag dar byas la sa dang lo ma'am dus dang mthun pa'i chu bsil ba gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should sprinkle the floor, wipe it down, and sweep it. He should set out cool water for drinking and washing, in accordance with the season.

original: wa kha dag bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: wa kha dag bsal bar bya'o //
translated: He should remove any loose stones.

original: dus shes par bya ste /🔽stan gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: dus shes par bya ste / stan gding bar bya'o //
translated: He should know the time.🔽He should prepare the seats.

original: bdug pa dang por phor gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdug pa dang por phor gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should set out the incense burner.

original: gal te ston pa'i yon tan bsgrag par bya bar nus na /
analyzed: gal te ston pa'i yon tan bsgrag par bya bar nus na /
translated: If he is able to proclaim the qualities of the Teacher,

original: bdag nyid kyis bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis bya'o //
translated: he should do so himself.

original: gal te ma nus na /
analyzed: gal te ma nus na /
translated: If he is not able to do so,

original: 'chad pa po la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //🔽kha zas kyi g-yos la brtags te g-yos zin na /
analyzed: 'chad pa po la gsol ba gdab par bya'o // kha zas kyi g-yos la brtags te g-yos zin na /
translated: he should request someone else to do so.

original: khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te gand'i brdung par bya'o //
analyzed: khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te gand'i brdung par bya'o //
translated: If the meal is ready, he should climb up onto the roof of the building and ring the ghaṇṭā.

original: sos ka tsha ba'i dus su bsil yab blangs te dge slong rnams la g-yab par bya'o //
analyzed: sos ka tsha ba'i dus su bsil yab blangs te dge slong rnams la g-yab par bya'o //
translated: In the spring, during the hot season, he should fan the monks with a yak-tail fan.

original: de'i 'og tu bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi ni tha ma /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi ni tha ma /
translated: After that, he should sit down in a place that is visible and accessible,🔽in front of the monks who have completed the rainy season retreat,

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi gong du spyod lam zhig bas 'dug @269b ste /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi gong du spyod lam zhig bas 'dug @269b ste /
translated: but behind those who have not completed it.

original: dge slong ma yin pa'i 'du shes bzhag la zas bca' bar bya'o //🔽zas kyi bya ba byas nas gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par brtul bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma yin pa'i 'du shes bzhag la zas bca' bar bya'o // zas kyi bya ba byas nas gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par brtul bar bya'o //
translated: He should think, “I am not a monk,” and then prepare the food.🔽After the meal is finished, he should put away the bedding in a sheltered place.

original: lhung bzed kyi gzhi yang byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi gzhi yang byi dor bya'o //
translated: He should also clean the place where the alms bowls are kept.

original: dus shes par byas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten rnams byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: dus shes par byas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten rnams byi dor bya'o //
translated: He should know the time and clean the stūpas of the Tathāgata’s hair and nails.

original: ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug par bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug par bya'o //
translated: He should anoint them with soft cow dung.

original: dgongs ka'i dus su yang gnas mal bsham par bya'o //
analyzed: dgongs ka'i dus su yang gnas mal bsham par bya'o //
translated: In the evening he should prepare the bedding.

original: pog phor nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: pog phor nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should set out the incense holder.

original: ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du bya'o //
translated: He should proclaim the qualities of the Teacher, as before.

original: dge bskos rnams ji skad brjod pa bzhin du dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge bskos rnams ji skad brjod pa bzhin du dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: The rector should say, “Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: deng du zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu yang 'das lags so //
analyzed: deng du zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu yang 'das lags so //
translated: Today the fifteenth day of the fortnight has passed.

original: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nyi ma brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nyi ma brjod par bya'o //
translated: ” In this way he should announce the days.

original: de nas spo ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas spo ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the recitation of probation should be explained.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la /
translated: I, the fully ordained monk named so-and-so,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'di lta bu dang / 'di lta bu byung ba dus 'di tsam zhig tu bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis dus 'di tsam zhig gi spo ba stsal ba de las /🔽dus 'di tsam zhig ni /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'di lta bu dang / 'di lta bu byung ba dus 'di tsam zhig tu bcabs pa dang / bdag la dge 'dun gyis dus 'di tsam zhig gi spo ba stsal ba de las / dus 'di tsam zhig ni /
translated: have committed such and such a partial defeat offense, and have concealed it for such and such a time. The saṅgha has granted me probation for such and such a time.🔽Of that,

original: bdag gis spyad lags te /
analyzed: bdag gis spyad lags te /
translated: I have used up such and such a time.

original: lhag ma yang spyad par bgyi na /
analyzed: lhag ma yang spyad par bgyi na /
translated: I will use up the remainder.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag la spo ba po dang mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa lags par gzung du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag la spo ba po dang mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa lags par gzung du gsol /
translated: Venerable saṅgha, please accept that I am engaged in the probation and pleasing conduct.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis spo ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis spo ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavān said, “The recitation of probation should be done.”

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la mi brjod pas bcom ldan 'das @270a *//🔽kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la mi brjod pas bcom ldan 'das @270a *// kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Since it was not done for those who had newly arrived, the Bhagavān said,

original: glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la brjod par bya'o //
translated: “It should be done for those who have newly arrived.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la spo bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la spo bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “You should announce the probation to those who have arrived unexpectedly.”

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong glo bur ba zhig 'ongs nas /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong glo bur ba zhig 'ongs nas /
translated: A newly arrived monk

original: des re zhig lhung bzed dang / chos gos kyang mkhos su ma phab par de'i mdun du sbo ba bo 'dug nas smras pa /
analyzed: des re zhig lhung bzed dang / chos gos kyang mkhos su ma phab par de'i mdun du sbo ba bo 'dug nas smras pa /
translated: did not put away his alms bowl and robes, but sat down in front of the monk who was to give the announcement and said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
translated: “Venerable, please pay attention!

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la /
translated: I, the monk so-and-so,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: have committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense.”

original: bdag la spo ba por gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: bdag la spo ba por gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: “Please accept me as the one who is to give the announcement.”

original: des de la kun nas dkris bas smras pa /
analyzed: des de la kun nas dkris bas smras pa /
translated: The other monk said to him, “You fool!

original: mi gti mug can spo ba yang mi dgos /
analyzed: mi gti mug can spo ba yang mi dgos /
translated: I don’t need a probationer,

original: khyod kyang mi dgos kyi /
analyzed: khyod kyang mi dgos kyi /
translated: and I don’t need you!

original: nga'i mdun du ma 'dug par song /
analyzed: nga'i mdun du ma 'dug par song /
translated: Go away and don’t sit in front of me!”

original: de ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas ngo smad nas spyod lam dal gyis dge slong de'i drung nas song ngo //
analyzed: de ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas ngo smad nas spyod lam dal gyis dge slong de'i drung nas song ngo //
translated: The newly arrived monk was ashamed and humiliated. He left slowly, with his head down.

original: skabs de / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: skabs de / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One, and the Blessed One said:

original: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su ma phab par brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su ma phab par brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: “A newly arrived monk should not speak until he has put away his bowl and robes.

original: gzhan yang / re re la yang brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang / re re la yang brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not speak to each one individually,

original: 'on kyang dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa la'o //
translated: but rather to the entire Saṅgha gathered and in agreement.

original: dge 'dun thams cad tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When the entire Saṅgha has gathered, the Blessed One said:

original: gand'i brdungs pa na ji snyed tshogs ba la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gand'i brdungs pa na ji snyed tshogs ba la brjod par bya'o //
translated: “When the gaṇḍī is struck, he should speak to as many as have gathered.

original: 'dis dge slong med pa'i gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar mi @270b bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis dge slong med pa'i gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar mi @270b bya'o //
translated: He should not go to a monastery without monks.

original: gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dgongs kar dus ji lta ba bzhin du chu dron po'am /
analyzed: gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o // dgongs kar dus ji lta ba bzhin du chu dron po'am /
translated: If he does go, he should not stay there.🔽In the evening, he should wash the feet of the monks with warm or

original: bsil bas dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsil bas dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa bkru bar bya'o //
translated: cold water, as is appropriate.

original: gal te mi 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te mi 'dod na /
translated: If they do not want that,

original: snum gyis byug bar bya'o //
analyzed: snum gyis byug bar bya'o //
translated: he should anoint them with oil.

original: de nas dran ba nye bar bzhag ste ldang ba'i 'du shes kyis nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dran ba nye bar bzhag ste ldang ba'i 'du shes kyis nyal bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having established mindfulness, he should go to sleep with the perception of rising.

original: spo ba dang mgu bar bya bar spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na /
analyzed: spo ba dang mgu bar bya bar spyod pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na /
translated: If the monks who are to be transferred and who are to be satisfied do not act in accordance with the rules of training,

original: 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: they become guilty of an offense.

original: dge slong rnams kyis de la gnas khang ma bskos /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis de la gnas khang ma bskos /
translated: The monks did not assign a dwelling place to him,

original: rnyed pa ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rnyed pa ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and did not give him any of the offerings. The Blessed One said,

original: thams cad kyi 'og tu de'i gnas khang bsko bar bya /
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'og tu de'i gnas khang bsko bar bya /
translated: “You should assign a dwelling place to him at the very end.

original: thams cad kyi 'og tu rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'og tu rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o //
translated: You should give him his share of the offerings at the very end.”🔽The summary:🔽Sixty, eight, twenty, the person,🔽The Sangha, satisfaction,

original: sdom la / drug cu dang ni brgyad dag dang // nyi shur gang zag bya ba dang // dge 'dun la ni mgu spyad dang // sha 'khon can dang 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: sdom la / drug cu dang ni brgyad dag dang // nyi shur gang zag bya ba dang // dge 'dun la ni mgu spyad dang // sha 'khon can dang 'ong ba'o //
translated: The one with a grudge, and the one who is coming.

original: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong rnams la spo ba byin pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong rnams la spo ba byin pa'i skabs de /
translated: When they gave probation to the monks,

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: the monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: spos ba'i dge slong bzhis spo ba sbyin par mi bya ste /
analyzed: spos ba'i dge slong bzhis spo ba sbyin par mi bya ste /
translated: “Monks on probation should not give probation to monks.

original: spos pa gsum dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gis ma yin /
analyzed: spos pa gsum dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gis ma yin /
translated: It is not to be given by three on probation and one who is not on probation.

original: spos pa gnyis dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis kyis ma yin /
analyzed: spos pa gnyis dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis kyis ma yin /
translated: It is not to be given by two on probation and two who are not on probation.

original: spos pa gcig dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gsum gyis ma yin te /🔽'on kyang thams cad yongs su dag pa /🔽lta ba mtshungs pa rnams kyis dge slong la spo ba @271a *//
analyzed: spos pa gcig dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gsum gyis ma yin te / 'on kyang thams cad yongs su dag pa / lta ba mtshungs pa rnams kyis dge slong la spo ba @271a *//
translated: It is not to be given by one on probation and three who are not on probation.🔽However, it is to be given by monks who are completely pure

original: sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin par bya'o //
translated: and have the same view.

original: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.

original: spo ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: spo ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.

original: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong rnams 'byin par byed pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong rnams 'byin par byed pa'i skabs de /
translated: The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.

original: spos pa nyi shus dge slong dbyung bar mi bya ste /🔽spos pa bcu dgu dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gis ma yin //
analyzed: spos pa nyi shus dge slong dbyung bar mi bya ste /🔽spos pa bcu dgu dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gis ma yin //
translated: The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers of the approvers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellers did it properly.🔽The monks who were the expellees did it properly.🔽The monks who were the approvers did it properly

original: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod ma yin pa nas /
analyzed: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod ma yin pa nas /
translated: The monks who are undergoing probation do not act in accordance with the rules, do not act in a way that pleases,

original: de bzhin du rang bzhin du gnas pa bcu dgu dang spos pa gcig gis ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang bzhin du gnas pa bcu dgu dang spos pa gcig gis ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
translated: and so on up to: the nineteen who are living in their natural state do not act in a way that pleases.

original: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: spos pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The monks who are undergoing probation act in accordance with the rules, act in a way that pleases, act in a way that pleases after having acted, and those who have given the training also do the same.

original: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong spos pa rnams kyi drung du spo ba spyod pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa rnams kyis dge slong spos pa rnams kyi drung du spo ba spyod pa'i skabs de /
translated: The monks of the group of six who were undergoing probation and acting in a way that pleases went to the monks who were undergoing probation and acted in a way that pleases.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks requested the Blessed One to do something about this, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong gis spos pa bzhi'i drung du spo ba spyad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong gis spos pa bzhi'i drung du spo ba spyad par mi bya ste /
translated: “Monks, monks who are undergoing probation should not go to the four who are undergoing probation.

original: spos @271b pa gsum pa dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la ma yi /
analyzed: spos @271b pa gsum pa dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la ma yi /
translated: It is not for one who has committed three offenses entailing expulsion and who has been restored to the natural state.

original: spos pa gnyis dang rang bzhin dug nas pa gnyis la ma yin /
analyzed: spos pa gnyis dang rang bzhin dug nas pa gnyis la ma yin /
translated: It is not for one who has committed two offenses entailing expulsion and who has been restored to the natural state.

original: spos pa gcig dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gsum la ma yin te /
analyzed: spos pa gcig dang rang bzhin du gnas pa gsum la ma yin te /
translated: It is not for one who has committed one offense entailing expulsion and who has been restored to the natural state three times.

original: 'on kyang thams cad yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang thams cad yongs su dag pa /
translated: However, it is for one who is completely pure

original: lta ba mtshungs pa rnams kyis drung du spo ba spyod par bya'o //🔽spos pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyad pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lta ba mtshungs pa rnams kyis drung du spo ba spyod par bya'o // spos pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du spo ba spyad pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / bslab pa byin pa rnams la yang de bzhin no //
translated: and who is in the presence of those who have the same view.🔽As with those who have committed offenses entailing expulsion, so it is for those who have committed offenses entailing a formal procedure of the community, those who have committed a serious offense, and those who have committed an offense of wrong conduct.🔽As with those who have committed offenses entailing expulsion, so it is for those who have committed offenses entailing confession alone, those who have committed offenses entailing confession and acknowledgment, those who have committed offenses entailing acknowledgment, and those who have committed offenses entailing verbal confirmation.

original: spo ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: spo ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzhi nas spo ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: As with those who have committed offenses entailing expulsion, so it is for those who have committed offenses entailing confession alone, those who have committed offenses entailing confession and acknowledgment, those who have committed offenses entailing acknowledgment, and those who have committed offenses entailing verbal confirmation.

original: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa rnams gtsug lag khang stong pa zhig tu dong nas spo ba spyad pa de rnams dge slong dag gis mthong nas smras pa /
analyzed: drug sde'i dge slong spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad pa rnams gtsug lag khang stong pa zhig tu dong nas spo ba spyad pa de rnams dge slong dag gis mthong nas smras pa /
translated: The monks saw them and said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerables,

original: gtsug lag khang 'dir ci /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang 'dir ci /
translated: what are you doing in this temple?

original: khyed cag gnas sam /
analyzed: khyed cag gnas sam /
translated: Are you staying here?”

original: de rnams kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: They said,

original: 'dir bdag cag mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'dir bdag cag mi gnas te /
translated: “We are not staying here.

original: 'on kyang spo ba spyod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang spo ba spyod do //
translated: However, we are undergoing probation.”

original: de rnams kyis smras pa /🔽khyed cag ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis smras pa / khyed cag ni /
translated: They said,

original: spo ba spyod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spo ba spyod pa ma yin te /
translated: “You are not undergoing probation.

original: 'on kyang 'chab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'chab pa yin no //
translated: However, you are concealing your offenses.”

analyzed: 'di gdams ngag dang / gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye gzhag par bya'o //
translated: If it is done, it is to be done like this.🔽The Blessed One said, It is not to be done.🔽If it is done, it is to be done like this.🔽The Blessed One said, It is not to be done.🔽If it is done, it is to be done like this.🔽The Blessed One said, It is not to be done.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig gso sbyong gzhag pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang chos kyi gnyis dang / chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum dang / chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi dang / chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang chos kyi lnga dang /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig gso sbyong gzhag pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang chos kyi gnyis dang / chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum dang / chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi dang / chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang chos kyi lnga dang /
translated: If it is done, it is to be done like this.🔽The Blessed One said, It is not to be done.🔽If it is done, it is to be done like this.🔽The Blessed One said, It is not to be done.🔽If it is done, it is to be done like this.

original: chos ma yin pa'i drug dang chos kyi drug dang / chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun dang / chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad dang / chos ma yin pa'i dgu dang chos kyi dgu dang / chos ma yin pa'i bcu dang chos kyi bcu'i gso sbyong gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i drug dang chos kyi drug dang / chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun dang / chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad dang / chos ma yin pa'i dgu dang chos kyi dgu dang / chos ma yin pa'i bcu dang chos kyi bcu'i gso sbyong gzhag pa'o //
translated: and the ten non-dharma poṣadhas and the ten dharma poṣadhas.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig gi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig gi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the poṣadha of the one non-dharma and the one dharma?

original: gzhi med pa'i byas pa gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i byas pa gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The poṣadha of the offense without basis

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: is the non-dharma poṣadha.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The poṣadha of the offense with basis

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: is the dharma poṣadha.

original: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i @274b gcig dang / chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i @274b gcig dang / chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gcig yin no //
translated: This is the one non-dharma poṣadha and the one dharma poṣadha.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang chos kyi gnyis kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang chos kyi gnyis kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the poṣadha of the two non-dharmas and the two dharmas?

original: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The positing of a purification through confession that is not based on a foundation, whether it is a transgression or a non-transgression,

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no /
translated: is the positing of a purification through confession that is not Dharma.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The positing of a purification through confession that is based on a foundation, whether it is a transgression or a non-transgression,

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: is the positing of a purification through confession that is Dharma.

original: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang / chos kyi gnyis kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i gnyis dang / chos kyi gnyis kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the positing of a purification through confession that is not Dharma and the positing of a purification through confession that is Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the positing of a purification through confession that is not Dharma and the positing of a purification through confession that is Dharma in terms of three?

original: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The positing of a purification through confession that is not based on a foundation, whether it is a transgression or a non-transgression, or whether it is a transgression or a non-transgression that is not based on a foundation,

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: is the positing of a purification through confession that is not Dharma.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The positing of purification and restoration based on the basis, based on what is not the basis, and based on both what is and is not the basis,

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: is the positing of purification and restoration in accordance with the Dharma.

original: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i gsum dang chos kyi gsum gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the positing of purification and restoration that is not in accordance with the Dharma and that which is in accordance with the Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the positing of purification and restoration that is not in accordance with the Dharma and that which is in accordance with the Dharma in four ways?

original: gzhi med pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho pa nyams pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho pa nyams pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The positing of purification and restoration based on the degeneration of morality, the degeneration of view, the degeneration of conduct, and the degeneration of livelihood, without a basis,

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //🔽gzhi dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / @275a *//
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no // gzhi dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / @275a *//
translated: is the positing of purification and restoration that is not in accordance with the Dharma.🔽The positing of purification and restoration based on the degeneration of morality, the degeneration of view, the degeneration of conduct, and the degeneration of livelihood,

original: 'tsho ba nyams pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: 'tsho ba nyams pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: with a basis,

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: is the positing of purification and restoration in accordance with the Dharma.

original: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i bzhi dang chos kyi bzhi'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the laying out of the four non-dharmas and the four dharmas.

original: chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang chos kyi lnga'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /🔽gzhi med pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyis gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang chos kyi lnga'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na / gzhi med pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyis gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: What is the laying out of the five non-dharmas and the five dharmas?

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //🔽gzhi dang bcas pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyis gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no // gzhi dang bcas pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyis gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The laying out of the Poṣadha by the non-dharmas is the laying out of the Poṣadha by the pārājika offenses without basis, by the saṃghāvaśeṣa offenses, by the pāyantika offenses, by the pratideśanīya offenses, and by the duṣkṛta offenses.

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: The laying out of the Poṣadha by the dharmas is the laying out of the Poṣadha by the pārājika offenses with basis, by the saṃghāvaśeṣa offenses, by the pāyantika offenses, by the pratideśanīya offenses, and by the duṣkṛta offenses.

original: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang / chos kyi lnga'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos ma yin pa'i lnga dang / chos kyi lnga'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the laying out of the five non-dharmas and the five dharmas.

original: chos ma yin pa'i drug dang chos kyi drug gi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i drug dang chos kyi drug gi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the laying out of the six non-dharmas and the six dharmas?

original: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
translated: “To set aside the poṣadha because of a deed without a basis, because of a deed not done without a basis, because of a deed done and not done without a basis, because of a deed done with a remainder without a basis, because of a deed not done with a remainder without a basis,

original: gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: because of a deed done and not done with a remainder without a basis,

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: is to set aside the poṣadha because of a non-dharma.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas @275b pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas @275b pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
translated: “To set aside the poṣadha because of a deed with a basis, because of a deed not done with a basis, because of a deed done and not done with a basis, because of a deed done with a remainder with a basis, because of a deed not done with a remainder with a basis,

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: because of a deed done and not done with a remainder with a basis,🔽is to set aside the poṣadha because of a dharma.

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa ste /
translated: The postponement of the purification of the Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are

original: chos ma yin pa drug dang chos kyi drug gi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa drug dang chos kyi drug gi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: the postponement of the purification of the Dharma and the postponement of the purification of non-Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the postponement of the purification of the Dharma and the postponement of the purification of non-Dharma for seven days?

original: gzhi med pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / gzhi med pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / gzhi med pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The postponement of the purification due to the absence of the basis of the degeneration of morality, the degeneration of view, the degeneration of conduct, and the degeneration of livelihood, and the postponement of the purification due to the absence of the basis of what is seen, heard, and suspected.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the postponement of the purification of non-Dharma.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The postponement of the purification due to the presence of the basis of the degeneration of morality, the degeneration of view, the degeneration of conduct, and the degeneration of livelihood, and the postponement of the purification due to the presence of the basis of what is seen, heard, and suspected.

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: This is the postponement of the purification of the Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are🔽the postponement of the purification of the Dharma and the postponement of the purification of non-Dharma for seven days.

original: chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i bdun dang chos kyi bdun gyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: The seven non-Dharma and seven Dharma poṣadhas are to be set aside.

original: chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight non-Dharma and eight Dharma poṣadhas to be set aside?

original: gzhi med pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes bcas dang / gzhi med pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes bcas dang / gzhi med pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The poṣadha is to be set aside due to the groundless defeat, the saṃghabheda, the sthūlātyaya, the pratideśanīya, the duṣkṛta, and the groundless seeing, hearing, and suspicion.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //🔽gzhi dang bcas pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas @276a *//
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no // gzhi dang bcas pa'i phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas @276a *//
translated: This is the non-Dharma poṣadha to be set aside.

original: dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: The poṣadha is to be set aside due to the defeat, the saṃghabheda, the sthūlātyaya, the pratideśanīya, the duṣkṛta, and the seeing, hearing, and suspicion that have a ground.

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: This is the Dharma poṣadha to be set aside.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the

original: chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i brgyad dang chos kyi brgyad kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: It is the postponement of the poṣadha ceremony for eight on non-Dharma and eight on Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pa'i dgu dang chos kyi dgu'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i dgu dang chos kyi dgu'i gso sbyong gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the postponement of the poṣadha ceremony for nine on non-Dharma and nine on Dharma?🔽It is the postponement of the poṣadha ceremony for those who have committed an offense without basis, those who have not committed an offense without basis, those who have committed and not committed an offense without basis, those who have committed an offense with remainder without basis, those who have not committed an offense with remainder without basis,

original: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /🔽gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa ma byas pa dang / gzhi med pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: those who have committed and not committed an offense with remainder without basis, those who have committed an offense without remainder without basis, those who have not committed an offense without remainder without basis, and those who have committed and not committed an offense without remainder without basis.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the postponement of the poṣadha ceremony for nine on non-Dharma.🔽What is the postponement of the poṣadha ceremony for ten on non-Dharma and ten on Dharma?

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i byas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa dang /
translated: the basis and what is done, the basis and what is not done, the basis and what is done and not done, the basis and what is done with remainder, the basis and what is not done with remainder,

original: gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa ma byas pa dang / gzhi dang bcas pa'i lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: the basis and what is done and not done with remainder, the basis and what is done without remainder, the basis and what is not done without remainder, and the basis and what is done and not done without remainder.

analyzed: chos kyi @276b gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /

translated: “What is not a defeating offense?🔽If a monk does not see a defeating offense in the aspects, signs, and indications of a defeating offense,🔽and if he does not see it in the signs,

analyzed: de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa ma yin zhing / dge slong de rnams kyang stan las langs nas so sor dong ba dang / des ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /

analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong @277a *//

analyzed: de lta bu ni /🔽phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa'o //🔽bslab pa spong ba ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /

analyzed: de lta bu ni /
translated: This is not

original: bslab pa spong ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bslab pa spong ba ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: bslab pa spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: “What is not a basis for a discussion of abandoning the training?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus la / gtam smra ba de yang de las byung ba ma yin /

analyzed: dge 'dun spong ba ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /

original: mtshan ma de dag gis ma yin la /
analyzed: mtshan ma de dag gis ma yin la /

analyzed: des ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi @277b dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: Since he does not see, hear, or suspect anything, he postpones the observance-renewal ceremony.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /🔽de lta bu ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /🔽de lta bu ni /
translated: This is an illegitimate postponement of the observance-renewal ceremony.🔽This is not the introduction to the topic of abandoning the Saṅgha.

original: dge 'dun spong ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun spong ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that the Saṅgha is abandoned.

original: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the case that is not the basis for a discussion of the abandonment of the Saṅgha?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus la /
analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus la /

original: gtam smra ba de yang de las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gtam smra ba de yang de las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: and the discussion is not about that,

original: de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa ma yin zhing /
translated: and the occasion has not arisen for that discussion,

original: dge slong de rnams kyang stan las langs nas so sor dong ba dang / des ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: dge slong de rnams kyang stan las langs nas so sor dong ba dang / des ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: and the monks have gotten up from their seats and left, and he does not see, hear, or suspect that the observance-day ceremony is being postponed,

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: then the postponement of the observance-day ceremony is not a postponement of the observance-day ceremony on the basis of the Dharma.

original: de lta bu ni /
analyzed: de lta bu ni /
translated: This is

original: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa'o //
translated: the case that is not the basis for a discussion of the abandonment of the Saṅgha.

original: tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the case that is not a violation of the rules of training?

original: phas pham pa bzhi rnams las /
analyzed: phas pham pa bzhi rnams las /
translated: It is this:

original: gang yang rung ba'i ltung ba ma byung bar dge slong de la ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i ltung ba ma byung bar dge slong de la ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: If a monk has not committed any downfall, and if he does not see, hear, or suspect that a fellow monk has committed a downfall, then he may set aside the purification ceremony.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /🔽de lta bu ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te / de lta bu ni /
translated: This is setting aside the purification ceremony in accordance with the Dharma.

original: tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not a case of a monk’s moral discipline being impaired.

original: lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /🔽lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las /
analyzed: lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na / lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las /
translated: What is meant by not impairing one’s view?

original: gang yang rung ba'i lta bar mngon par ma zhen par dge slong de la ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i lta bar mngon par ma zhen par dge slong de la ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: If a monk has not developed attachment to any of the sixty-two views, and if he does not see, hear, or suspect that a fellow monk has developed attachment to any of the sixty-two views, then he may set aside the purification ceremony.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /🔽de lta bu ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te / de lta bu ni /
translated: This is setting aside the purification ceremony in accordance with the Dharma.

original: lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not a case of a monk’s view being impaired.

original: spyod pa nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /🔽bslab pa'i gzhi rjes su mthun zhing 'tsham pa'i tshig gi lam dag gis smras na /
analyzed: spyod pa nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /🔽bslab pa'i gzhi rjes su mthun zhing 'tsham pa'i tshig gi lam dag gis smras na /
translated: What is meant by not impairing one’s conduct?🔽If a monk has not committed any of the four root downfalls, and if he does not see, hear, or suspect that a fellow monk has committed any of the four root downfalls, then he may set aside the purification ceremony.

original: yang dag par sgrub pa de la dge slong gis @278a *//
analyzed: yang dag par sgrub pa de la dge slong gis @278a *//
translated: “Monks,🔽

original: ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /🔽chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni / chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: “Monks, if you do not see, hear, or suspect that a monk is practicing correctly, then you may clear the purification ceremony.

original: de lta bu ni /
analyzed: de lta bu ni /
translated: If you do so, you are clearing an illegitimate purification ceremony.

original: spyod pa nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa nyams pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not a lapse in conduct.

original: 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: “What is not a lapse in livelihood?

original: de'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin na /
translated: If a monk’s livelihood is pure,

original: de la dge slong gis ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la dge slong gis ma mthong ba dang / ma thos pa dang / mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: then if you do not see, hear, or suspect that he is practicing correctly, you may clear the purification ceremony.

original: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /🔽de lta bu ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te / de lta bu ni /
translated: If you do so, you are clearing an illegitimate purification ceremony.

original: 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin pa'o //🔽dkar po'i phyogs la phas pham pa yin pa dang / phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / bslab pa spong ba yin pa dang / bslab pa spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / dge 'dun spong ba yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin pa'o //🔽dkar po'i phyogs la phas pham pa yin pa dang / phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / bslab pa spong ba yin pa dang / bslab pa spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / dge 'dun spong ba yin pa dang /
translated: This is not a lapse in livelihood.🔽“What is a lapse in view?

original: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa yin pa dang / lta ba nyams pa yin pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa yin pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa yin pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa yin pa dang / lta ba nyams pa yin pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa yin pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa yin pa yin no //
translated: it is the degeneration of morality, the degeneration of view, the degeneration of conduct, and the degeneration of livelihood.

original: phas pham pa yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: phas pham pa yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it a defeating offense?

original: dge slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag gis de phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung bar mthong la /
analyzed: dge slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag gis de phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung bar mthong la /
translated: If a monk sees through the aspects, signs, and indications of a defeating offense,

analyzed: des mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /
translated: and he suspends the poṣadha ceremony because of what he has seen, heard, or suspects,

original: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /
translated: then he suspends the Dharma poṣadha ceremony.

original: de lta bu ni /

analyzed: phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it the basis for the story of a defeating offense?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te / de lta bu ni /

analyzed: thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni /

analyzed: chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te /

translated: That is

analyzed: bslab pa spong ba yin no //

analyzed: bslab pa spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus la /

translated: are not in agreement.

original: tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Let us go to the Blessed One. Having gone, we will ask the Blessed One about this matter. We will hold to it just as the Blessed One explains it to us.”

original: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then the many monks went to the Blessed One. Having gone, they bowed their heads at the Blessed One’s feet and sat to one side.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: While sitting to one side, the many monks said this to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa / bsnyen bkur gyi gnas 'dir bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng ste zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: btsun pa / bsnyen bkur gyi gnas 'dir bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng ste zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o //
translated: “Honored One, we many monks gathered and assembled in this place of worship and had this kind of discussion. … We will hold to it just as the Blessed One explains it to us.”

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di zhus lags te /
analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di zhus lags te /
translated: up to “Venerable One, we have asked the Blessed One about this matter.

original: bdag cag gis gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi /🔽bla mar bgyi /
analyzed: bdag cag gis gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi / bla mar bgyi /
translated: To whom should we show respect,🔽esteem,

original: rjed par bgyi /
analyzed: rjed par bgyi /
translated: honor,

original: mchod par bgyi zhes bya ba nas thog mar bsod snyoms longs spyad par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: mchod par bgyi zhes bya ba nas thog mar bsod snyoms longs spyad par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: worship, up to ‘we should partake of the first alms’?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /🔽khyed kyis ches rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bya /
analyzed: dge slong dag / khyed kyis ches rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bya /
translated: “Monks,

original: bla mar bya /
analyzed: bla mar bya /
translated: you should show respect to the most senior,

original: rjed par bya /
analyzed: rjed par bya /
translated: esteem,🔽honor,

original: @281b mchod par bya /
analyzed: @281b mchod par bya /
translated: worship,

original: mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: mngon du smra ba dang / phyag dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bya'o //
translated: and do the work of verbal salutations, prostrations, rising up, joining palms, and bowing.

original: de ni / khyed cag gi stan gyi thog ma dang / btung ba'i thog ma dang / bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyad par 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni / khyed cag gi stan gyi thog ma dang / btung ba'i thog ma dang / bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyad par 'os pa yin no //
translated: That is the first seat for you, the first drink, and the first alms to be enjoyed.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: khyed kyis ches rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bya zhes bya ba nas bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyad par bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa rgan pa dag la bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: khyed kyis ches rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bya zhes bya ba nas bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyad par bya'o // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa rgan pa dag la bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: “You should respect the oldest,” and so on, up to “You should enjoy the first alms.”

original: bla mar byed /🔽rjed par byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed / rjed par byed /
translated: The monks did as they were told and served the oldest householders.🔽They revered them,

original: mchod par byed pa na /
analyzed: mchod par byed pa na /
translated: honored them,🔽and made offerings to them.

original: bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams smod par byed /
analyzed: bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams smod par byed /
translated: Faithful brahmins and householders criticized them,

original: gzhogs 'phyas byed /
analyzed: gzhogs 'phyas byed /
translated: slandered them,

original: kha zer bar byed de /
analyzed: kha zer bar byed de /
translated: and spread it about, saying,

original: 'phags pa dag /🔽bdag cag ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag / bdag cag ni /
translated: “Noble ones,

original: 'dod pa la spyod pa lags /
analyzed: 'dod pa la spyod pa lags /
translated: we are people who indulge in desire.

original: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba lags na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba lags na /

original: ci'i slad du khyed bdag cag la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhes pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: ci'i slad du khyed bdag cag la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhes pa'i skabs de /
translated: Why do you serve us?”

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: ngas rab tu byung ba rnams la dgongs te gsungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ngas rab tu byung ba rnams la dgongs te gsungs pa yin gyi /
translated: I spoke with the ordained in mind.

original: khyim pa rnams la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyim pa rnams la ni ma yin no //

original: dge slong rnams kyis gzhan mu stegs can rgan pa rgan pa dag mthong nas bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis gzhan mu stegs can rgan pa rgan pa dag mthong nas bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: When the monks saw the non-Buddhist ascetics who were older than themselves, they paid them homage,

original: bla mar byed /🔽rjed par byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed / rjed par byed /
translated: honored them,🔽worshipped them,

original: mchod par byed nas /
analyzed: mchod par byed nas /
translated: and served them.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: ngas chos 'di pa rnams la dgongs te gsungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ngas chos 'di pa rnams la dgongs te gsungs pa yin gyi /
translated: I spoke with the followers of the Dharma in mind,

original: phyi rol ba rnams la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol ba rnams la ni ma yin no //
translated: not with the non-Buddhists in mind.

original: de @282a *// rnams kyi rab tu byung ba'i dge tshul rgan po dag mthong nas bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: de @282a *// rnams kyi rab tu byung ba'i dge tshul rgan po dag mthong nas bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: When they saw the older novices who had gone forth, they paid them homage,

original: bla mar byed /🔽rjed par byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed / rjed par byed /
translated: honored them,🔽worshipped them,

original: mchod par byed nas /
analyzed: mchod par byed nas /
translated: and served them.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: ngas bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnams las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ngas bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnams las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin gyi /

original: dge tshul rnams la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dge tshul rnams la ni ma yin no //

analyzed: de rnams kyi rgan po gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag la bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: When they saw the older ones who had recently become fully ordained, they paid them homage,

original: bla mar byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed /
translated: honored them,🔽worshipped them,🔽and served them.

original: rjed par byed /
analyzed: rjed par byed /
translated: They bowed down to the Blessed One,

original: mchod par byed nas /
analyzed: mchod par byed nas /
translated: and made offerings to him.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: phan tshun lo'i dang po dris nas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: phan tshun lo'i dang po dris nas phyag bya'o //
translated: “You should bow down to each other after asking about the first year.”

original: de rnams kyis dris pa las /
analyzed: de rnams kyis dris pa las /
translated: They asked each other,

original: na tshod kyi lo smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: na tshod kyi lo smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
